pr_title: Display apache license notice on startup

timeline.message: Display apache license notice on startup.

timeline.bodyText: just wonder if we should bump this to a warning...
timeline.author: rolfyone

replies.bodyText: I don't think there's a better example of an informational message. :) Warn implies something the user should be concerned about but this is just routine information they may need to know.
replies.author: ajsutton

replies.bodyText: who pays attention to info messages.... :)
replies.author: rolfyone

timeline.message: Merge branch 'master' of github.com:ConsenSys/teku into display-license
